definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: North across the demilitarized zone and shan democratic People's Republic of Korea adjacent.
sentences.chinese: 在非軍事區和陝北朝鮮民主主義人民共和國相鄰。

sentences.english: The two sides met in the border village of Panmunjom in the Demilitarized Zone.
sentences.chinese: 兩國高層軍事談判在非軍事區內的板門店舉行。

sentences.english: North Koreans work in the fields near Panmunjom in the demilitarized zone.
sentences.chinese: 在非軍事區板門店附近，北朝鮮人在田裏幹活兒。

sentences.english: I visited the capital, Pyongyang, and some surrounding sites including the DMZ [demilitarized zone].
sentences.chinese: 我遊覽過首都平壤，和周邊的一些非軍事區景點。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier looks toward the southern side of the demilitarized zone on May 24.
sentences.chinese: 5月24日，一名北朝鮮戰士望着非軍事區的南方。
